app_metadata.description: An open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server
app_metadata.name: headscale

run_as_context.description: Headscale runs as any non-root user.

app_metadata.title: Headscale

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Headscale

attrs.label: Headscale Server URL
attrs.description:
The url clients will connect to.</br>
Example: https://headscale.example.com:443</br>

attrs.label: DNS Configuration
attrs.description: Configure DNS for Headscale.

attrs.label: Base Domain
attrs.description:
Defines the base domain to create the hostnames for MagicDNS.</br>
This domain _must_ be different from the server_url domain.</br>
Base Domain must be a FQDN, without the trailing dot.</br>
Example: example.com</br>
The FQDN of the hosts will be</br>
`hostname.base_domain` (e.g., _host.example.com_).

attrs.label: Global DNS Nameservers
attrs.description: List of DNS servers to expose to clients.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description:
You can add map any option from the config.yaml file as an environment variable.</br>
See available options here https://github.com/juanfont/headscale/blob/main/config-example.yaml</br>
Convert the key to an environment variable by following these rules:</br>
- Prefix the key with `HEADSCALE_`.</br>
- Convert the key to uppercase.</br>
- Convert any `.` to `_`.</br>
For example, `log.format` will be converted to `HEADSCALE_LOG_FORMAT`

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Headscale files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Headscale files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Certificate
attrs.description: The certificate to use for Headscale.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.description: Enable ACL for the storage.

attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

Headscale

Headscale is an open source, self-hosted implementation of the Tailscale control server.
